title: India says not sending troops to Sri Lanka
body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – India’s High Commission in Colombo says there is not truth in report that troops would be sent to Sri Lanka.
The High Commission said it “strongly denies blatantly false and completely baseless reports in a section of media that India is dispatching its soldiers to Sri Lanka.”
“The High Commission also condemns such irresponsible reporting and expects the concerned to desist from spreading rumours.”
India has been funding Sri Lanka’s imports through credit lines after money printing created forex shortages and also wrapping up its strategic objectives. (Colombo/Apr02/2022)
